title: [LFT] MID AND SUP MAIN LOOKING FOR SERIOUS TEAM
body:
Hi I'm Sprattyy and I'm a mid/sup main. I have a KDA with {{champion:34}}  of 3.8, KDA of 2.9 on {{champion:223}} , 2.6KDA with {{champion:61}} . I play a lot of {{champion:134}} in norms but I dont have a ranked KDA for her, but i would estimate around 3. I also play a lot of {{champion:89}} in norms and would estimate a KDA of around 3.2. 

I am looking for a serious ranked 5s team for season 6. I was placed in bronze 3 with winning 8/10 promos and then have been stuck in elo hell, however **my mmr in norms pairs me up with gold/plat**. Please add me "sprattyy" and send me a message if you're interested in me playing in your team or would like to test me out.

Or comment on the thread

My Lolking:
http://www.lolking.net/summoner/oce/1553170#profile

Let me know :)

replies.body:
Hey man i am thinking of making a team, but i need players who will be on very often, If you know of some drag them along with you to my team.
IGN: Kat To Plat (add if you wanna talk some more)
add me ig and we'll talk
hey man i might be interested i main adc and sup but mostly sup, my mains are lux, mf, aatrox,
im looking for a team haha not players
dude message me in game i got a potential spot for u
